content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "chainmail_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft the stripped_jungle_wood I need to place 4 stripped_jungle_logs in a 2x2 square in the crafting table. I will start by moving 1 stripped_jungle_log from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "chainmail_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I need to move another stripped_jungle_log from slot 12 to slot 2, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "chainmail_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I need to move another stripped_jungle_log from slot 12 to slot 4, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "chainmail_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I need to move another stripped_jungle_log from slot 12 to slot 5, which is below slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_jungle_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "chainmail_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}]
thought: Now I can craft the stripped_jungle_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
